translations: 对象链接和嵌入（Object Linkingand Embedding）

sentences.sentence: On the tip of a tree which had lost all its other leaves, two still remained hanging from one twig: Ole and Trufa.
sentences.translation: 在一棵其它叶子都掉光的树顶上，还有两片挂在一根细枝上：奥立和特鲁法。

sentences.sentence: My ole man used to work there.
"I started fixin' up ole bicycles fer poor kids."
sentences.translation: “我开始为穷孩子们修理旧自行车。”
